name: Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp.
description: Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp. is a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) focused on identifying and merging with innovative technology companies in the fields of artificial intelligence, machine vision, and sensor technology. Founded in 2020, the company aims to bring transformative solutions to market by leveraging advanced technologies that enhance automation, data analysis, and operational efficiency across various industries. Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp. targets businesses that are poised for significant growth and can benefit from the operational expertise of its management team. The firm is dedicated to creating long-term shareholder value by identifying opportunities in sectors where technological advancement is rapidly evolving. By focusing on companies that harness the power of machine learning and advanced sensing capabilities, Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp. seeks to meet the increasing demand for smarter, more efficient systems in manufacturing, transportation, and consumer products. The company operates under the belief that the integration of cutting-edge technology into traditional practices can lead to unprecedented advancements and improved outcomes across various applications.

seo.meta_title: Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp. | Innovating Through Technology
seo.meta_description: Explore Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp., a leading SPAC focused on merging with technology innovators in AI and sensor technology. Discover our mission and growth strategy.

faq.question: What is Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp.?
faq.answer: Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp. is a SPAC that aims to merge with innovative technology companies in the fields of AI and sensor technology.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp.?
faq.answer: Michael C. H. Wong is the CEO of Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp.

faq.question: Where is Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp. headquartered?
faq.answer: The company is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What industries does Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp. focus on?
faq.answer: The company focuses on technology, artificial intelligence, and sensor technology industries.

faq.question: When was Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp. founded?
faq.answer: Vision Sensing Acquisition Corp. was founded in 2020.
